data.eml:eml: Redescription of Limnosida frontosa Sars, 1862 (Crustacea: Cladocera: Sididae), with evidence of possible incipient species differentiation

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Korovchinsky, Nikolai M. (2014): Redescription of Limnosida frontosa Sars, 1862 (Crustacea: Cladocera: Sididae), with evidence of possible incipient species differentiation. Zootaxa 3764 (1): 61-80, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.1.4
